ok
Amazing

Very Enjoyable at the start, learning the mechanics will keep you interested for a good time. After that the game i feel begins to become a bit more try hard to climb in the survivor and killer ranks.

 For survivors escaping the killer is nice with flashbangs, Flash lights, running around objects and many more mechanics to escape the killer and waste time for your other survivors to repair generators.

 For Killers you mostly have the advantage in the early stages (Rank Killer 20-12) after that the game becomes really competitive and survivors are out to waste your time, they will make sure anything you do will waste at least a generators worth of time. Im Rank Killer 7 and i think the game is in a balanced state in my opinion (others may disagree) i play wraith and think the game is fun for both roles but have to admit killers are favored to win in most scenarios

Игра с кучей багов не достойна моего внимания, но я, проявляя жалость к разработчикам, играю в неё.
В игре присутствует ущимление прав пользователей, это выражается в том, что пользователи получают несправедливые баны, например, за то, что игра сама выкидывает пользователя из игры.
Количество читерастов зашкаливает, а разработчики не могут разработать античит для борьбы с ними.

Dead by daylight is a very fun and tense game. I wish it was easier to find out what exactly some statuses and abilities do. It is very cryptic and it took me forever to find the game manual that would host the status effect descriptions. It seems to be too cryptic and needs to be a bit more clear. I do like the many in-game mechanics and it brings an awesome challenge and pumps me full of adrenaline and enjoyment while I play. I think everyone should give this game a try even if they are jumpy.

《Dead by Daylight》是一款多人（4對1）恐怖遊戲，由一名玩家扮殘暴殺手，其餘的四名玩家則扮演逃生者。逃生者試圖從殺手的魔爪下逃亡，避免被他捉住、折磨及殺死。

I have been on and off with this game since its release in 2016 (playing on console then transitioning to PC). It always occurs to me that no matter how many times I take a break from it, I always want to come back at some point. There is no other game I have played that gives me this kind of feeling. There is a handfull of asymmetric horror online games nowadays, however none of them seem to come close to what Dead by Daylight has achieved in my opinion, at least at the time of writing this. There are many survivors and killers to choose from and play as, both available as original and/or licenced DLC.
 There has been a time where I deemed the game unplayable due to various bugs and mini-exploits that kept occuring. It was then that I took a long break before coming back to it almost a year later. I was relieved to see that the game was in a much better state from the time I left it, what with many fixes being implemented and a lot of content added in. Some bugs still exist here and there of course, but the development team has proven time and again that they care for their game and are engaging enough with its community in order to keep making it better. 
 Long story short, if you are looking for a fun multiplayer "horror" game to play alone or with your friends, then this is the game for you. Whether you like playing alone as the Killer or as a Survivor with teammates, if you like playing casually with fun-gimmicky perks/items or competitively with meta perks/add-ons, in normal ranked matchmaking or in custom games with your pals, then I highly recommend Dead by Daylight.

很好玩的非对称竞技游戏，只不过对于我这种萌新屠夫很苦手，刚开始守尸会被骂，不守尸还抓不到节奏点容易四跑，晚上打匹配的话很容易匹配到车队，都是一些紫段红段的人类车队来欺负屠夫，毁灭打击肥婆出柜，再加上两个手电筒来搞心态，不过打人跟朋友一起玩会很快乐，独狼玩家玩屠夫也有应有的乐趣，虽然我这些日子高血压的时候居多，但是冷静下来会仔细反思一下自己的操作，最近一段时间还会去看教学心理博弈以及版区分布，是让一个很长时间没有体会过游戏快乐的玩家重新获得快乐的游戏，非常开心也非常荣幸能够因为魔王绝版重新进入黎明杀机的大家庭，这个游戏我虽然买的很早但是玩的却很晚，还在观望要不要入手的好兄弟不要犹豫！抓紧入手！

Dying in Dark Souls is more fun than playing this game. 

Playing this game you will give you few good moments when you get a satisfying 4k as a killer, or a very close call escape when you playing as a survivor and that adrenaline rush will be the best thing ever, but 90% of matches will be pure frustration caused by toxic survivors or killers.
